member.name: T:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperation
member.summary: Defines class for managed operations.
member.remarks: Managed operation is the execution of any method with the ability to pause, resume, and interrupts. During the execution of the operation is performed logging and monitoring.

member.name: T:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem
member.summary: Defines the base class for managed operations.
member.remarks: Managed operation is the execution of any method with the ability to pause, resume, and interrupts. During the execution of the operation is performed logging and monitoring.

member.name: M:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.#ctor(DevExpress.ExpressApp.XafApplication)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ManagedOperationItem class.
member.remarks: Creates new instance of the ManagedOperationItem class in the context of XafApplication
member.param: XafApplication instance in which the operation is performed.

member.name: M:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.#ctor(DevExpress.ExpressApp.XafApplication,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ManagedOperationItem class.
member.remarks: Creates new instance of the ManagedOperationItem class in the context of XafApplication
member.param: XafApplication instance in which the operation is performed.
Start operation in separate thread. 'True' by default. Set 'false' if you need to run operation in current thread.

member.name: M:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.Resume
member.summary: Set ManagedOperationItem.InternalStatus to "Resuming".

member.name: M:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.Suspend
member.summary: Set ManagedOperationItem.InternalStatus to "Suspending".

member.name: M:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.Cancel
member.summary: Set ManagedOperationItem.InternalStatus to "Cancelling".
member.remarks: If ManagedOperation has subprocesses, their status is also set to "Cancelling".

member.summary: Report about event during managed operation and set parameters of process.
member.param: The sequence number of the current step. The numbering of steps starts from 1. So, if the operation has totalStep = 3, then step numbers should be 1,2,3.

member.name: M:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.Dispose
member.summary: Freeing resources associated with ManagedOperationItem instance.
member.remarks: Use this method to release unmanaged resources associated with ManagedOperationItem instance.

member.name: E:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.CustomizeStartMessage
member.summary: Allow to change operation start message.

member.name: E:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.CustomizeCompleteMessage
member.summary: Allow to change operation complete message.

member.name: P:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the ManagedOperation has been disposed of.
member.remarks: When this property returns true, the ManagedOperation is disposed.

member.name: P:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.Count
member.summary: When 'Split' property is 'true', 'Count' property set limit of messages in one trace item. By default it set to 1000.

member.name: P:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.Interval
member.summary: Interval in milliseconds in which information will be logged to LogStorage. If it set to '0', log will updated on each step of managed operation. By default it set to 2000 ms.

member.name: P:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.Split
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to split log. If it set to 'true', log will splitted when when the RecordCount value of OperationTraceItem exceeds 'Count' property value.
member.remarks: When this property returns true, the ManagedOperation is disposed.

member.name: P:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.CheckInterval
member.summary: Interval in seconds after which it will be checked whether the operation is canceled.
member.remarks: Use this value if you want to set your interval in seconds. By default, it set to 5 seconds.

member.name: P:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.HasErrors
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether there are errors in operation.
member.remarks: When this property returns true, the ManagedOperation has errors.

member.name: P:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.HasWarnings
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether there are warnings in operation.
member.remarks: When this property returns true, the ManagedOperation has warnings.

member.name: P:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperationItem.TraceLevel
member.summary: Specifies what messages to log

member.summary: Start managed operation. Use this overload for unique operations.

member.name: M:Xafari.ManagedOperations.ManagedOperation.RunSupportThread
member.summary: Это сделано для предотвращения ситуации, когда у процесса очень длительное время выполнения шага или вдруг шаг не может завершиться, и тогда работающий процесс висит в памяти. ПИР 102.120325.

member.name: T:Xafari.ManagedOperations.TracingStrategy
member.summary: Logging strategy determines possible methods of tracing.

member.name: F:Xafari.ManagedOperations.TracingStrategy.OwnLevel
member.summary: Logging on each level without copying on root level.

member.summary: Logging on each level with copying on root level.

member.name: F:Xafari.ManagedOperations.TracingStrategy.RootLevel
member.summary: Logging on root level only.
